name: Eryn the Agile
description: A young and agile female scout, wearing a short cloak and light leather armor. She holds a grappling hook and small throwing knives, nimbly perched on high stone steps within the dungeon. Familiar with all dungeon exits and entrances, always one step ahead.
description_ch: 一位年輕敏捷的女性斥候，穿著短斗篷和輕便的皮甲。她手持抓鉤與小型飛刀，靈活地棲息在地城內的高處石階上。熟悉所有地城出口入口，永遠搶先一步。
